verses.name: Mark 14:31
verses.text: But he spake the more vehemently, If I should die with thee, I will not deny thee in any wise. Likewise also said they all.

verses.name: Mark 14:32
verses.text: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane: and he saith to his disciples, Sit ye here, while I shall pray.

verses.name: Mark 14:33
verses.text: And he taketh with him Peter and James and John, and began to be sore amazed, and to be very heavy;

verses.name: Mark 14:34
verses.text: And saith unto them, My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death: tarry ye here, and watch.
